channel.title: reviews on Sounding
channel.description: Recent content in reviews on Sounding

item.title: Listening in 2011
item.description: Three years ago was the last time I did any kind of “year’s review” of aural nourishment, and I sort of feel the need to do it again. Those 24 hours of music are worth revisiting, and the following may not even count as a “best of,” but it is some of the best music I’ve heard this year, and I listen to an awful lot. Maybe call it a “compendium”?
